Main method to launch Maze game as a java application.
makeWall(int[], int[]) - Method in class generation.HorizontalWallBoard
For this class, cellBack and cellForth refer to cells forward/backward across rows.

makeWall(int[], int[]) - Method in class generation.VerticalWallBoard
For this class, cellBack and cellForth refer to cells forward/backward within row.
Map - Class in gui
This class encapsulates all functionality to draw a map of the overall maze, the set of visible walls, the solution.

mapToCoordinateY(int, int) - Method in class gui.Map
Maps the y index for some cell (x,y) to a y coordinate for drawing.

Maze - Interface in generation

MazeApplication - Class in gui
This class is a wrapper class to startup the Maze game as a Java application This code is refactored code from Maze.java by Paul Falstad, www.falstad.com, Copyright (C) 1998, all rights reserved Paul Falstad granted permission to modify and use code for teaching purposes.

MazeBuilder - Class in generation
This class has the responsibility to create a maze of given dimensions (width, height) together with a solution based on a distance matrix.

mergeSets(int[], int[]) - Method in class generation.MazeBuilderEller
Given two sets with reference to coordinates in this.cells, combine the two sets by transferring all coordinates to one of the two sets and deleting the other set from cellSets.
